inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Octopus Deploy project

inputs.name: ReleaseNumber
inputs.label: Release Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of the release to deploy. Use 'latest' to deploy the latest release.

inputs.name: Environments
inputs.label: Deploy to Environments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of environments to deploy to.

inputs.name: ShowProgress
inputs.label: Show Deployment Progress
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the build process will only succeed if the deployment is successful.

inputs.name: DeployForTenants
inputs.label: Tenant(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deploy the release for this comma delimited list of tenants. Wildcard '*' will deploy to all tenants currently able to deploy to the above provided environment.

inputs.name: DeployForTenantTags
inputs.label: Tenant tag(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deploy the release for tenants who match these tags and are ready to deploy to the provided environment.

inputs.name: AdditionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments to be supplied to Octo.exe. See [Octo.exe Command Line documentation](http://docs.octopusdeploy.com/display/OD/Deploying+releases) for available parameters.
